title: After I've pretty much done anything else in the client, I can't Right Click Loot
body:
After I've done pretty much anything in the client, if I go into loot to try and say... unlock skins, or disenchant shards, I can't right click anything. Want to combine mastery tokens? Nope. Wanna disenchant and champion shard for blue ess? Nope. Wanna unlock a skin as a permanent? Nope.

The only cure is to re-login and immediately go to loot and do it.

replies.body: Try giving those loot icons a left click to see if that pulls up the menu or not. If that still doesn't help, let's have you go ahead and run a quick repair through the game client to make sure none of those files are damaged.
